<div id="" class="item bluePPG left wText">
  <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XRGeU8xh45I"><img src="/getmedia/da765217-4843-4602-9756-1f0d043d93c2/from-industries-to-families.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>From industries to families, we've got you covered.</h1>
    <p>If our paints and coatings can protect commercial jets, you can be confident they can protect your house or DIY project against whatever life throws at it.</p>
    
    <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XRGeU8xh45I">Watch the video &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="" class="item orange left wText">
  <a href="http://www.duranar50.com"><img src="/getmedia/791930f3-d8e6-49df-9e79-dc9f12090b4b/duranar50-banner-orange.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>PPG DURANAR<sup>&reg;</sup> Coatings: Beautifying the best for 50 colorful years.</h1>
    <p>Over the past half-century, Duranar coatings have been specified by renowned architects to protect and beautify some of the world's most instantly recognized architectural landmarks.</p>
    
    <a href="http://www.duranar50.com">Visit Duranar50.com &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="" class="item cyan left wText">
  <a href="https://youtu.be/cTgU5xYS_PQ"><img src="/getmedia/3d151a5f-23d1-44eb-a1f2-7a237e354035/nhl.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>PPG and the NHL&reg; are now on the same winning team.</h1>
    <p><center><img src="
/getmedia/a99c7e8b-3350-42bd-a5f1-b285dd5b5353/official-paint-of-the-NHL.aspx " alt="Official Paint of the NHL" width="286" height="150" /></center></p>
    
    <a href="https://youtu.be/cTgU5xYS_PQ">See more &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="ppg-b007" class="item green left wText">
  <a href="http://corporate.ppg.com/Our-Company/Diversity.aspx"><img src="/getmedia/41b3ec5a-d05f-4fb2-9ae2-99e6bd5dc3ee/openness.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>It takes openness, energy, and perspective to make the world a more beautiful place.</h1>
    <p>At PPG, everyone has a role in protecting and beautifying the world. It's our individual heritage and unique perspectives that make us stronger together.</p>
    
    <a href="http://corporate.ppg.com/Our-Company/Diversity.aspx">Learn more &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="color0" class="item orange left wText">
  <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L785qdR9FtU"><img src="/getmedia/93bb4fbb-c888-49c8-8d35-bb3f32c0d384/anniversary-2017.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>Our Colorful Communities&trade; program started in our own backyard. Since then, we've beautified places all over the world.</h1>
    <p>We launched our <i>Colorful Communities</i> program with a mission to transform schools, hospitals, gardens and playgrounds where our employees live and thrive. See what we've accomplished so far.</p>
    
    <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L785qdR9FtU">Watch the video &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="" class="item orange left wText">
  <a href="https://diy.ppg.com/products/wood-stain"><img src="/getmedia/99e7b547-2ad1-45fc-a8a3-824da8365294/timeless-banner-02.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>Exceptional protection. Enduring beauty.</h1>
    <p>The Advanced Woodcare Technology in PPG Timeless® Stain helps homeowners complete lasting, professional-quality decks they can enjoy for years to come. 
Now available exclusively at The Home Depot.</p>
    
    <a href="https://diy.ppg.com/products/wood-stain">Start Your Project  &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="commu0" class="item green left wText">
  <a href="http://www.ppgcommunities.com/2016CommunityEngagmentReport"><img src="/getmedia/a3d2fde7-94f0-42ce-82af-2b3232fe1358/community-engagement-report.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>For us, making the world a more beautiful place starts right at home.</h1>
    <p>See how our community efforts brighten local neighborhoods, lift spirits, and make the world more colorful.</p>
    
    <a href="http://www.ppgcommunities.com/2016CommunityEngagmentReport">Get the report &gt;</a>
    
   </div>
</div><div id="ppgbr00" class="item orange left wText">
  <a href="https://youtu.be/kQjtU_FwfV0"><img src="/getmedia/d0e5490a-405c-498c-a654-38f71ccd0b9a/manifesto_1.jpg.aspx?width=960&height=396&ext=.jpg" /></a>
  <div>
    <h1>Making the world a more beautiful place is a big job. But we love a challenge.</h1>
    <p>From coatings that help cars resist scratches, to paint that shields planes from the sun, we're proving beauty can be more than skin deep.</p>

   </div>
</div><div id="" class="item green left wText">

  <td>
    <p align="center"><img alt="PPG opens automotive refinish training center in Argentina" src="/getmedia/ca77fa43-0fd7-44a4-a9d1-2e968fe6abdb/IMG_9025.jpg.aspx?width=288&amp;height=191" style="width: 288px; height: 191px;" /></p>

<h2>New automotive refinish training center opens in Argentina</h2>
<br />
We recently opened a new 300-square-meter training center for automotive refinish professionals in Pillar, Argentina&nbsp;to train more than 300 refinish technicians at the state-of-the-art facility annually.&nbsp;<br />
<br />
PPG experts will train technicians from Argentina, Chile and Uruguay on all of PPG&rsquo;s automotive refinish product lines and color modules, as well as application techniques. The new facility expands PPG&rsquo;s training resources in southern Latin America, adding to the automotive refinish training center it currently operates in Sumaré, Brazil.<br />
<br />
<a class="more" href="/Media/Newsroom/2017/08-17-2017-PPG-opens-automotive-refinish-trainin">Learn more</a>

<h2>PPG launches PPG TIMELESS premium paint at The Home Depot</h2>

<h3>Paint line leverages PPG&rsquo;s expertise in coatings for airplanes, cars, ships and more</h3>
<br />
PPG recently announced the launch of PPG TIMELESS&reg; paint and primer in one. This premium paint for interior and exterior use incorporates PPG&rsquo;s industry-leading coatings innovation and expertise so do-it-yourselfers (DIYers) can be certain that they will have beautiful results for years to come.<br />
<br />
PPG Timeless paint is widely available at THE HOME DEPOT&reg; locations across the U.S. and at <a href="http://homedepot.com" target="_blank">homedepot.com</a>. It is the first paint product that prominently carries the PPG name to be sold through a major home improvement center.<br />
<br />
<a class="more" href="/Media/Newsroom/2017/PPG-launches-PPG-TIMELESS-premium-paint-at-The-Hom">Read more</a>

<h2>How High-Tech Coatings Will Smooth The Automated Driving Revolution</h2>
<br />
Artificial intelligence will power the automated driving revolution. So will improvements in connectivity and machine vision. But don&rsquo;t forget about coatings &mdash; the paints and other substances that will cover autonomous vehicles (AVs).&nbsp;<br />
<br />
In this latest article on Forbes.com, learn how these inconspicuous products will be the unsung heroes of the driverless future.<br />
<br />
<a class="more" href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/ppg/2017/08/14/how-high-tech-coatings-will-smooth-the-automated-driving-revolution/#214a91ec54b6">Read more on Forbes.com</a>
  </td>


</td>  


  <td>
    <h2>Four PPG products named finalists for R&amp;D 100 Awards</h2>
<br />
The R&amp;D 100 Committee and R&amp;D Magazine recently announced its list of 2017 R&amp;D 100 Awards Finalists, on which PPG earned four spots with its products. The awards program, which is in its 55th year, honors the 100 most innovative technologies of the past year.<br />
<br />
The PPG products on the finalist list include: Premium Compact Process Primer, Audioguard&reg; P8370 liquid-applied structural damper (LASD), Liquid Nails Fuze*It&reg; and the ENVIROCRON&reg; EXTREME PROTECTION Powder Coating System. The products made the list because of their innovative qualities that solve problems in the automotive and construction industries, according to the magazine.<br />
<br />
The winners will be announced during the annual R&amp;D 100 Conference in November.<br />
<br />
<a class="more" href="https://www.rdmag.com/article/2017/08/2017-r-d-100-awards-finalists-announced">Read more</a>

<br />
<a class="more" href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/ppg/2017/06/16/3-high-tech-coatings-making-air-travel-safer-faster-cooler-and-more-colorful/#3bea1a7d7503" target="_blank">Read more on Forbes.com</a>
